page.title: 07Choppington Nursery School
page.content: The children who come to our nursery have to be 3 years old. There are 26 children in the nursery in the mornings and 26 other children in the afternoons. There is one teacher and one nurse. Children in the nursery play with sand and water, they paint pictures, build with lego bricks and make jigsaw puzzles. The children enjoy playing games. They learn to sing songs and nursery rhymes. They play percussion instruments. When the weather is fine the children play out- side in the garden. After the children have played, they have a story then have their dinner. Fifteen children stay for dinner which is made by the nursery cook. Children have to be 4 years old to attend Nursery School all day.
